tool.name: Y Ploidy Check
tool.description: Checks the ploidy of the y chromosome from DetermineGermlineContigPloidy to confirm specification in samplesheet
tool.command: grep "^Y" $input > $output && echo "ATTENTION - THE BIOLOGICAL SEX OF THIS SAMPLE IS DIFFERENT FROM WHAT WAS SPECIFIED ON THE SAMPLESHEET" > email.txt && grep "SM:" $input >> email.txt && grep "Y" $input >> email.txt && BIOSEX_NUM=\$(grep -P "^Y\t1" $input | wc -l) && echo \$BIOSEX_NUM && echo $biosex && if [ \$BIOSEX_NUM -eq $biosex ]; then echo "{\"y_ploidy_check\": 1}" > $json_output; exit 0; else if [ -z ${5} ]; then echo "Biological sex does not match Samplesheet"; else cat email.txt | mailx -s "\$(hostname) Biological Sex Check Tool Error" "${email}"; fi; echo "{\"y_ploidy_check\": 0}" > $json_output; exit 1; fi

param.name: email
param.label: Admin Email
param.help: Send failure reports to this email address
